document.full_text: the united states has asked beijing to investigate google's latest allegation of a major hacking attack that the internet giant says originated in china, the state department said on friday.
document.title: u.s. raises google hack allegation with china
lines_and_colors: the united states has asked beijing to investigate google's latest allegation of a major hacking attack that the internet giant says originated in china, the state department said on friday.
